text.__SUMMARY__: Galium cometerhizon is a species of plants in the Rubiaceae. It is native to the Pyrenees of Spain and France, and the Island of Corsica in the Mediterranean.Galium cometerhizon  is a low-growing, mat-forming herb with succulent leaves and white flowers.
